review: The Fire TV Stick has been great for us.  We don't have cable or satellite, just antenna TV, so it has opened a whole new world of streaming entertainment. The Stick has worked flawlessly since we activated it.
author: David T Walker

review: I have had roku, apple tv, and i also have a smart tv.The fire stick is the best of all.The user experience is the easiest and most pleasant of all of them and picture, resolution, buffering...all excellent.Plenty of apps...games, too.Remote is simple (very), making it something even a non-electronic-savvy person can enjoy.The option of using any other device as a remote is great, too...especially if you are like me, and tend to lose remotes.I would definitely advise anyone looking for this type of entertainment to buy this product!
author: Mlowe

review: Awesome, love this thing!!!!!!!!!I have a (somewhat) smart TV but it is a pain to navigate when connected to the internet. This makes it super easy.Would recommend it to everyone.
